circumstances: Eleanor Pollard, a 60-year-old woman from North Berwick, was reported missing after failing to return home from a visit to a local farm on Abbotsford Road. It was known she had been exhibiting behavioral patterns of suicidal ideation, raising concerns about her safety among family and friends. A colleague mentioned Eleanor had recently expressed interest in visiting remote islands, adding to fears she might have headed to an isolated area. Her grandfather noted a marked shift in her demeanor after a visit to a nearby church, close to 3 Renaissance View. Eleanor was eventually traced by family members at a relative's address on 50 Lothian Road, appearing disoriented but unharmed.
